comments.text: 按照这个顺序接下来应该是圣德太子

data.text:
#38811
#每日东方同人歌曲推荐
#东方Project #东方project #东方 #音乐 #同人 #同人音乐 #MisteryCircle
**Day 26 《TWO FACES》 / 专辑《The Slavelation》 - MisteryCircle**
原曲 緑眼のジェラシー

本来我是计划连着做诸子百家中几个重要学派x东方同人音乐的分析的，但最近听到这个，实在是太好听了……

[[Youtube]](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=em2moO3su1s)[[歌词]](https://thwiki.cc/%E6%AD%8C%E8%AF%8D:TWO_FACES)
>ALL I NEED, BREAKING DOWN.
BUT I THINK, FAKE ME RIGHT?
TWO FACES TALKING INSIDE
JUST GOD AND EVIL
"I WANT SATISFY YOU KNOW?"
"BUT FEEL IS REALLY FACT"
TWO FACES OBEY ME ALL
CRAWLING IN MYSELF
DO I KNOW WHAT I MEAN?
DO I KNOW WHO AM I?
DUALING SAFARI, TAKING ME FORBIDDEN
DECEIVING YOU, DECEIVING ME.
KNOW THE SUFFERING BY LIES.
DON'T KNOW HOW MUCH TIME HAS PAST.
STEADY PAIN COME FROM THAT DAY.
WORDS BY LIES PAINTED TO GRAY.
AND I LOST MY PARADISE.
SO TELL ME WHAT BETTER WAY.
AS YOU SEE I'M "SICK ONE".
REPENTANCE COMES TOO LATE.
YOU'RE TELLING ME.
JUST I WANNA BEAT THEY UP
SO YOU GET OUT OF MY FACE
ONCE FACE IS TALKING INSIDE
"I WANT FREE I KNOW?"
WORK TO BE DONE IS ONE IN CASE AND I KNOW?
TWO FACES OBEY ME ALL
CRAWLING IN MYSELF
GRAVE ME ONE OF THE FACT IN FICTION
I'LL BE MESS IN MYSELF
DECEIVING YOU, DECEIVING ME.
KNOW THE SUFFERING BY LIES.
DON'T KNOW HOW MUCH TIME HAS PAST.
STEADY PAIN COME FROM THAT DAY.
WORDS BY LIES PAINTED TO GRAY.
AND I LOST MY PARADISE.
SO TELL ME WHAT BETTER WAY.
AS YOU SEE I'M "SICK ONE".
DECEIVING YOU, DECEIVING ME.
KNOW THE SUFFERING BY LIES.
DON'T KNOW HOW MUCH TIME HAS PAST.
STEADY PAIN COME FROM THAT DAY.
KEEP ON ASKING,,, AND IT WILL BE GIVEN YOU
KEEP ON SEEKING,,, AND YOU WILL FIND
IN THE END,,, AIN'T NOTHING BUT PUPPET.
